wikipedia_page.main: Paul Stead (born 9 August 1958) is a British designer, entrepreneur and CEO of BreweryLondon, a creative business catalyst. Alongside this Paul has a number of board positions supporting a portfolio of business interests, whilst also lectures at a number of UK Universities. Prior to his current role, Paul was the co-CEO at NewEdge; a US/UK innovation strategy consultancy, known for the premise "you can kill an idea, but you can't kill an opportunity". He has also held several executive level positions with leading firms such as Fitch Worldwide and PSD Associates.
